name: Racer Higgins
description: This a time-trials based 3D game where the player controls a car that moves at high speed through a level. The goal is to reach the end of the level as quickly as possible. During each level the player must avoid obstacles while trying to stay on the track. This game is made more unique by the fact that this car is a hover-car that can adjust its gravity to that of whatever surface it is riding on. If the track goes sideways, the car goes sideways.
